text: The taxonomic lineage obtained from UniProt for all the reviewed viral proteins correspond to the Baltimore classification system. To do the conversion between the Baltimore and ICTV classification systems, we matched the organism name for each reviewed sequence from UniProt with the organism names obtained from the ICTV master species list 2015 v1, available at: https://talk.ictvonline.org/files/master-species-lists/ m/msl/5945 [Accessed 20 September 2016].
